___aud.description: audience - details of the app producing the API

___sgen.description: the security generation of the tenant

___pt.description: the tenant who has installed the app producing the API

___cons.description: details of the app consuming the API

___sgen.description: the security generation of the tenant

___ct.description: the tenant who has installed the app consuming the API

$eref.description: A set of SAML values that uniquely identify this person, consistently across TAS apps, and with any number of potential IdPs

_88principalType.description: a class of principal (typically a human) identifiable by SSO. In theory developer-defined but for now only TAS can create.

___samlKey.description: key of the SAML assertion with the the TAS core SAML database

___api.description: the URI template of the API

___exp.description: time the token expires, as per the spec.

___sot.description: whether the API is being consumed as SoT (if true) or not

___iat.description: time the token was issued, as per the spec.
